result.arabic_text: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَلَّا يَجۡعَلَ لَهُمۡ حَظّٗا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
result.translation: 176. Nabiyow munaafiqhiinik koroosannü fanah yasissike marih Sabbatah Rooka koo gee waytay, Diggah usun sinni koroosannut inkinnah tu-kalah Yallal tu- mabaahan sinni nafsik tu-kalan ken Akke waytek, Yalli Akeeral galtok hebeltö maglab keenih yaceem maaba, usun Akeeral kaxxa digaalay gibdi-lon.
